name: Dreamy Quest 13
description:
Once was a demo, now it's real.

v0.19 changes

  • warp portal
  • added title graphic
  • disable touch controls on non mobile devices
  • fixed player motion after attack
  • new dialogue / interaction for goal
  • organize animation nodes
  • rename, reposition portal in scene
  • added camera animation
  • adjust collision

v0.18 changes

  • warp portal
  • minor code cleanup
  • "to be continued" screen
  • text animations
  • redraw background sprites
  • fade animations

v0.17 changes:

  • animation tweaks
  • flower animation
  • punch animation
  • dialog animation
  • title page start button fix - prevent multiple presses

v0.16 changes:

  • animation tweaks
  • plant item pickup / destroy
  • mystery friend
  • tile collision
  • jump fix
  • crouch fix
  • punch fix
  • item interactions

v0.15 changes:

  • jump control
  • speed boost
  • background sprites
  • parallax scrolling
  • title screen text
  • touch button sound adjustment

v0.14 changes:

  • added rudimentary title screen
  • testing viewport scaling—2d
  • redrawn player sprites, animation
  • sfx volume refinement

v0.13 changes:

  • parallax background texture

v0.12 changes:

  • animated sprite

v0.11 changes:

  • button sound

v0.10 changes:
